Premises:
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
betweenf = MF.between : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart :=
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} :
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart

expf_L1_I_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in ~ expf m x y0 -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0

```coq
intros m x z Hinv Hsucc.
unfold expf, B, cA, cA_1, bottom, top in *.
destruct m; simpl in *.

- destruct x0; simpl in *; eauto.

Qed.
